name: Letting the water run every time you brush your teeth, for one year
description: Letting the water run for three minutes uses up to 18L of water!

name: Driving 100km in a car
description: The average European car gives off about 120 grams of CO2 for every kilometer driven.

name: Eating lamb once per week for a year
description: During the production of one kilogram of lamb meat, about 40kg of CO2 is emitted!

name: Buying 1000 euros worth of computer and IT equipment
description: The carbon footprint of computer and IT equipment is often underestimated.

name: Flying from Paris to New York and back
